pages.text: By engraving silver into the blocks, they can disperse the soul tears in a slightly safer manor.$(br) I will need to make a proper structure out of this, something to contain the soul tears without being solid silver. Some kind of $(l:cages/tier_i)soul cage$(/l) perhaps?
Eight seems like a very good number for this.

While these blocks will not accept tears from an outside source, it is pretty simple to fix that.$(br)These conduit connectors can be used to provide the soul cage with the tears it needs. They could also carry things through the tears out of the cage? That sounds a bit hazardous though.
Make sure to include one in every soul cage. No more than that, as it is hard to control the flow as it is.
